FuncDef: The display software crl command displays information about a digital signature certificate revocation list (CRL) file. The display software crl command displays information about a digital signature certificate revocation list (CRL) file.
ExtraInfo: If an issued digital signature certificate needs to be revoked due to key disclosure or other reasons, a third-party tool can be used to mark the certificate invalid and add the certificate to a digital certificate CRL. To check information about the digital signature CRL file, run the display software crl command.
